metadata.title: RHSA-2021:0473: .NET 5.0 on Red Hat Enterprise Linux security and bugfix update (Important)
metadata.description:
.NET is a managed-software framework. It implements a subset of the .NET
framework APIs and several new APIs, and it includes a CLR implementation.

New versions of .NET that address a security vulnerability are now available. The updated versions are .NET SDK 5.0.103 and .NET Runtime 5.0.3.

Security Fix(es):

* dotnet: certificate chain building recursion Denial of Service (CVE-2021-1721)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2021-1721 dotnet: certificate chain building recursion Denial of Service

platform: .NET Core on Red Hat Enterprise Linux
